name: Space Chefs from Space
description:
Space Chefs from Space is a third-person tower defense game with farming elements. Play as G-Ma and protect your secret recipe book from waves of alien chefs by planting crops and building vegetable themed turrets!

7Gnomes is a team of seven students from Niagara College who created this game in their senior year. We were tasked with creating the game from an original concept over the course of two semesters with 4 months to plan and conceptualize the game, then use the remaining 4 months to actually build it. Their goal was to create a fun, unique game that was as enjoyable to make as  it is to play

Like what you see? Check out our team's Twitter https://twitter.com/7_gnomes

Our team

Jenni Rivers - Team Lead, Creative Director, 2D Artist, Ui Design

Jacobo Gallego - Programming Lead 

Jac McFarland - Programmer 

Chris Bell - 3D Artist, Animator, VFX

Ben Diamanti - Level Designer, Ui Programmer

Austin Grover - 3D Environmental Artist, SFX 

Nero Fortier - 3D Character Artist, Character Animations
